about_the_game:
My name is Temple, I was a traversal specialist on an expedition.

We were studying a new artifact. Turns out it was a portal. Return is impossible.

Momentum-Driven Parkour


Grappling hooks, wings, hover boots, bounce pads, wall jumps, and more. Chain moves together to surmount complex obstacles. Stay the course, or make your own, for there are few true paths.

Explore an Alternate Dimension


Discover an otherwordly landscape of lava caverns and frozen landscapes. Depending on the path your choose, different locations will be found. This is a 3D metroidvania with no dead ends.

Customize your Gear


Find new clothing options in the nooks and crannies of the world. Swap colors all you want, or mix and match hairstyles. Will you become a fearless explorer, or a strange girl with a mustache?

Frightening Mystery


Your not alone. In this beautiful world a powerful being searches for you in the dark. Gather your courage, and don a high tech visor to navigate the ruinous netherworld.

Enter into the Veil, the Alter Unknown

name: Veil: Alter Unknown

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Core i3-3225 3.3 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A sci-fi, momentum-driven parkour adventure. Wield a grappling hook and glider as you try to escape an unknown, alternate dimension.
